ROM.Changelog:
EN: Changes by the MiuiPro team:
Added:
Color settings for items in the diler
- The name of the city, time, etc.
- Sim, grilles, etc.
The ability to include an incoming call is always in full screen (Instead of a pop-up window)
Updated:
Google games
Google Apps
Web View
Arrangement of elements in the dealer
Corrected:
The quality and size of photos on some devices
Full-screen photo application in real time
MiDrop icon in explorer, on some devices
Muting the sound when setting the time for the bucket
Update request time (Enlarged)
Transfer
Changes by Xiaomi:
Added:
Setting the sound to SMS
Portrait mode for devices with one camera
Portrait mode for front camera
Optimized:
The accuracy of the map can be changed
Corrected:
Identify the sender of the message
